It contains a combination of two hormonal medicine levonorgestrel and Ethinyl estradiol. Choice tablet works by mimicking the action of natural female hormones present in the body. Choice tablet should be taken as prescribed by your doctor, also it is very important to take this medicine regularly as missing a dose may lead to failure of contraception. Oral contraceptives are one of the most reliable methods of contraception if used correctly, can make your periods regular and may relieve premenstrual syndrome. Before you start taking this pill inform your doctor if you smoke and are over 35 years of age, have any medical condition and are on other medications and supplements.
